attributes.action: Re-evaluate the eligibility for Child Care Benefit
attributes.additional_details:
Eligibility should be on family income not individual..  Please change the system and also increase the threshold limits. Living in London with 60K having 2 kids and mortgage/rent is not easy
Please sign the petition to Government looks at it. Together we can make a change happen
attributes.background: Stop chancellor from unfairly targeting single-income and single parent families. A family where both parents earn below the higher rate threshold of £50K and having double tax free allowance will receive child care benefit in full but a family with single income of £60K will not receive any!
